structure.unit: Uniform Operation Of Commercial Motor Vehicles Act

law.catch_line: Commercial Driver Licenses; Issuance; Expiration; Renewal

text.section: the name and residential address of the person;
a physical description of the person including sex, height;
the person’s social security number and any number or identifier deemed appropriate by the registrar;
the class or type of commercial motor vehicle or vehicles which the person is authorized to operate, together with any endorsements or restrictions;
the name of the commonwealth; and
the dates between which the license is valid.
